attributes.action: Urge OFCOM to allocate space on the DAB platform for Hospital & community radio stations.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
After the demise of such DAB radio station's as Planet Rock, Core, Capital Disney, DNN, The Jazz, Primetime Radio, 3C, Oneword and many others, would it not make sense to allocate a slot on DAB digital radio to local hospital & community radio stations?

Oneword was replaced in February by a loop of bird song, What a waste of a frequency! 
 
I'm sure hospital & community stations would value their place on DAB and it would help sustain their service in the future after the digital switch over.
